text: 🚨 Measles vaccination saves lives! 💉 According to the WHO, accelerated immunization activities have prevented an estimated 57 million deaths between 2000-2022. 💪 Routine vaccination and mass campaigns in high-case countries are key to reducing measles deaths. 🌎 In 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine, and 83% received one dose by their first birthday. 🎉 The Measles & Rubella Partnership (M&RP) is leading the charge to achieve the Immunization Agenda 2030 targets. 💯 Let's keep up the good work and protect our communities from measles! 🙏
